name: CO2025
description:
*Demo Build*

CO2025

CO2025 is a Demo of a educational game developed over four days in Unity. You  play as a worker from an energy company in the year 2025, where the CO2 emission has risen to a critical level. Your job is to use CCS to reduce CO2 in built up Areas. We set out for this game to be a unique experience that teaches the concepts of carbon capture storage in a fun way. 

If we were chosen to take this game further this is a list of stuff we would add:

- Overall Polish ( From 4 day demo to polished prototype)

- Optimization Such As Occlusion Culling

- More Locations To Balance

- More Gameplay mechanics

- Animations

- More Technical Inclusions Further Detailing The Process Of Carbon Capture Storage + Interactable Underground Proccesses / More Educational Content.

-  More Ways To Alter Fix The Environments (E.g Regenerating Ecosystems, building bigger carbon capture unit at first.

- Full Tutorial

-Bug Fixes

- The game is extremely adaptable so any requests from the client in terms of changes can be easily incorporated into the idea. We are more than happy to mold this project into exactly how it would be wanted for an expo.
